rows.label: tlk41300012_02_msg0001
rows.name:
So I hear someone seriously vandalized
the water tower in Trigo.

rows.label: tlk41300012_02_msg0002
rows.name:
Naturally, I felt I should do something
to chip in. Any respectable Gulan
would do the same.

rows.label: tlk41300012_02_msg0003
rows.name:
I already sent them over some iron,
so here's hoping they'll be able to
restore it.

rows.label: tlk41300012_02_msg0004
rows.name:
But who'd do a thing like that
anyway? Was it that Iira bunch
that everyone's been talking about?
